nodes.description: 2017年4月15日15:30（UTC+3），叙利亚反对派控制区Al-Rashideen检查站附近发生公交车队爆炸事件，造成超过100人死亡
nodes.support_text: Summary On April 15, 2017, an explosion rocked a convoy of buses carrying evacuees near Syria’s opposition-held Al-Rashideen leading to more than 100 deaths.

nodes.description: 爆炸后国际媒体最初误传为运送零食的救援车爆炸，但Ahmad Makiya于4月16日发布视频显示实际为蓝色现代汽车载有炸弹
nodes.support_text: A video showing the moments before the explosion indicate that instead of the aid vehicle a blue Hyundai Porter carried the bomb; The Hyundai Porter has some distinctive characteristics, including what appears to be a ‘signature’ of the workshop where it was likely upgraded with a cage, and a sloppy painted yellow-green-red colour scheme on the side.

nodes.description: Bellingcat发起数字调查，发现叙利亚多地存在与爆炸车辆相似的蓝色现代波特货车
nodes.support_text: Bellingcat launched a digital hunt for similar Porters in Syria. Many similar trucks have been found, though no exact match has been found up to date.

nodes.description: 调查发现目标车辆具有独特特征：W77标志、混乱的绿黄红三色涂装、驾驶室围栏改造痕迹
nodes.support_text: The Hyundai Porter has some distinctive characteristics, including what appears to be a ‘signature’ of the workshop where it was likely upgraded with a cage, and a sloppy painted yellow-green-red colour scheme on the side; The W77 sign on the side of the truck, which may refer to the workshop that makes steel cages for pick-up trucks like the Porter, a local source told Bellingcat.

nodes.description: 通过对比分析排除部分疑似车辆，确认W77标志与叙利亚多地 workshops有关联，但未锁定具体归属
nodes.support_text: Bellingcat has not found any evidence to indicate that the type of vehicle, the vehicle’s colour scheme or the markings had any particular meaning, such as indicating that it belonged to a particular group; The W77 sign and a similar 77W sign can be spotted on several blue Hyundai Porters in Syria, though no exact match has been found up to date.

nodes.description: 调查发现类似三色涂装出现在Jinah和Jisr al-Shugur两辆波特货车，但未明确其象征意义
nodes.support_text: The Porter’s Side: W77 and the Colour Scheme ‘W77′ and ’77W’: A Workshop’s Signature? The W77 sign can also be spotted on a Kia truck shown in footage from Al-Bab in the Aleppo governorate. Besides, a W77 sign has also been spotted on a vehicle used as a ‘technical’ by Jabhat al-Nusra militants.

nodes.description: 最终形成开放调查结论：车辆特征与多方势力存在重叠，需进一步数字协作确认责任方
nodes.support_text: This is an investigation with open ends, remaining questions are listed at the end of this article. You are welcome to join the digital pursuit of the vehicle by commenting under this article, contacting me via christiaantriebert@bellingcat.com or @trbrtc on Twitter.
